message.body: Hey! Any word on work? Also, do you think tour apt could put a couple a friends up on sat night? Totally totally fine if it doesn't work
Hey chicken! Headed to work now so I will try to get a straught answer. People can definitely stay on saturday. I work until about 2 so they can either take my
Key to get rest and theb wake up to let me in or go out until 2?
Oh and your girl parker posie sat next to me at lunch today ;)
Shit I meant friday night not saturday... Dumb! Might not be an issue anymore though bc I think they're heading back. Make them hire me!!!! Fuck, I'll just bus in every weekend if theyd take me...
Hahaha - it will kill your spirit. Friday is easier!!
Any word on workin'? Sorry to bug you, I'm just trying to plan rides.
No worries! Right now it doesn't look like he's willing to take u. It's supa disorganized though lol...
Well shit.... I think I'll have to head back to Philly that night then. I just can't spend a dollar and I'm sure I'll be tempted when you're our working. :(
Oh no! But I understand and besides, I have to werk sat and sunday anyways :( but at least I get to see u on friday!
So I've been writing to my gma and I have to share this line she wrote when she composed a random essay about NU "on a fall day, when leaves have started to
Fall and one is able to see through the thicket to the top of the steep hills, one might, with the use of a telescope, see the writer with some children admirin
The panoramic view from a favorite trail called Indian Point"
That's beautiful! Is she submitting it somewhere?
No, she wrote it a long time ago...but included it in a letter she wrote me. Isn't it? Ahhh, that new ulm feeling..
What's going on???
About to go to the first show! It's at the Japan society in manhattan. Then after in going to the one I'll see you at :)
Yahoooo!!! Japan society or asia society? Where's it at?
Japan society 47th and between 1st and 2nd!
We have a free ticket!
Ah! I would come but I'm still down at abt...
Can you make it by 8?
Not now because I'm still finishing some stuff >:O
Give it uppppppppp and come!
But I also agreed to happy hour with claire, aka liz lemon
Where you at?
